name: Win/Win
description:
Win/Win is a vertical space shooter where killing each enemy slowly corrupts the game. Try to aim for the highest score without missing a single enemy. This game is inspired by Lose/Lose by Zach Gage.

WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES.
PLEASE DO NOT PLAY IF YOU HAVE A HISTORY OF EPILEPSY.

ENEMIES

  • Green enemies will corrupt the game's sprites/visuals
  • Blue enemies will corrupt the game's audio/music
  • Red enemies will corrupt random memory addresses and game variables.

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys / D-Pad - Move left/right
Z / O - Fire
